resources.string: Please turn on the Permission of lock screen, If you want to remove this App, you should go to 【Settings】→【Security】→【Device administrators】and cancel permission first.

Only one function that is Turn Off and Lock Screen in this App, if you don\'t like press power key, maybe you like it. If you want to remove this App, you should go to 【Settings】→【Security】→【Device administrators】and cancel permission first.
Remove permission of Device administrators succeed, You can remove this App Now.
